text: The Muppet Movie is a 1979 musical road comedy movie directed by James Frawley and produced by Jim Henson. It was written by The Muppet Show writers Jerry Juhl and Jack Burns. The Muppet Movie was the first movie to star the Muppets. In 2009, The Muppet Movie was selected by the United States National Film Registry. ==Plot== The movie tells the origin story of the Muppets, as Kermit the Frog goes on a cross-country tour to Los Angeles, encountering several of the Muppets who all share the same ambition of finding success in professional show business along the way while being pursued by a greedy restaurant person named Doc Hopper who plans to turn Kermit into a frog legs dish. ==Notes== == References == Category:1970s musical movies Category:1979 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:British musical movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies about pigs Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about bears Category:American road movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies featuring puppetry Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:American family comedy movies Category:American independent movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies
